data.title: Evergreen Christian School
data.text:
Our family is so thankful to have found Evergreen Christian School in Leesburg! We were looking for an academically rigorous high school program with more offerings (variety of courses, advanced/AP classes, extracurriculars, and athletics) than the typical local Christian private school. Evergreen is a unique find for Northern Virginia families seeking an excellent private high school with a mission to make a kingdom impact and raise the next generation of godly young men and women

Read Article Thankful Eagle Family

Congratulations to our ECS Concert Choir on an outstanding performance on Thursday, Oct. 14 at the Trinity Christian School Fall Music Concert! All the TCS instrumental and choral groups performed, and our ECS Concert Choir joined the TCS Concert Choir to sing three songs together. It was a blessing to collaborate in song and make many new friends.

Read Article ECS Fall Choir Concert

Congratulations to ECS students Jems B. and Niya H. who were recognized as Honorees at Loudoun 100, a group of 100 people selected from Loudoun County who have "made an impact or been a hero to the community."

Read Article ECS Students Honored at Loudoun 100

For 9th and 10th grade students, the PSAT is used to familiarize students with the format and the general difficulty level of the questions. The goal is that by the time they are juniors and take the PSAT, they will be comfortable with the format and what to expect on the test (reducing test anxiety) and do their best. ECS uses the results to track student achievement and progress from year to year and helps guide us in course offerings and placement.

Read Article ECS Students Take PSAT 2021

Evergreen Christian School is a new high school in Loudoun County, VA, and is accepting applications for grades 9 and 10 for fall 2021. Grade 11 will be added in fall 22, and grade 12 will be added in fall 23. School starts Aug. 24, 2021 and applications are still being accepted. Contact us today to apply for '21-'22 or find out more information about future years. Admission Phone: 703-505-5332, Admission Email: Admission@ECSLoudoun.org

Read Article School Starts Aug. 24 - Apply Today!

Our very own Michael Dewey, Head of School for Evergreen Christian School, was a guest on the Breakaway Radio Show hosted by Kevin Krueger on WGTS 91.9. We encourage you to listen to the interview as Mr. Dewey talks about #ECSLoudoun and the value of Christian education as we raise the next generation of Christian leaders.

Read Article Head of School Interview on WGTS Radio

Evergreen Christian School is pleased to announce its membership with the Cognia Global Network. Cognia is the worldwide leader in school accreditation, providing accreditation for the majority of public and private schools in the United States. Our goal will be to apply for full accreditation in the Spring of 2023 and host a Cognia review team in the Fall of 2023.

Read Article Evergreen Christian Announces Cognia Membership

The Evergreen Christian School Admission Team looks forward to meeting prospective school families at Reston Bible Church on Sunday, August 1, before and after church services (9:00 and 10:45 a.m.). With renovations currently underway at our high school campus, located at 21336 Evergreen Mills Road, ECS is thankful to Reston Bible Church located at 45650 Oakbrook Ct, Sterling, VA, for hosting our Admission Team. ECS is accepting applications for grades 9 and 10 for the '21-'22 school year. For more information on how to apply, please visit the admissions section of our website.

Read Article August 1 - ECS Admission Team at Reston Bible Church

Thank you to Blue Ridge Bible Church in Purcellville for hosting the ECS Admission Team on Sunday, June 6, to enable families interested in Evergreen Christian School to learn more about our new high school in Loudoun County. Blue Ridge Bible Church is located at 770 S. 20th St, Purcellville, VA.

Read Article Blue Ridge Bible Church in Purcellville Hosts ECS June 6

Cornerstone Chapel in Leesburg hosted a Christian School Fair for parents and students seeking more information about Christian education in the community. Representatives from area Christian schools greeted perspective parents and students in the atrium area of the church to provide school information and answer questions.

Read Article Christian School Fair at Cornerstone Chapel in Leesburg

This week we received the long-awaited approval by Loudoun County of the school's zoning special exception, which will allow the total renovation project to begin. Now we are moving ahead with building permits and construction. This puts us another step closer to accepting applications for the 2021-2022 school year.

Read Article Campus update

Welcome and thank you for taking the time to pursue Evergreen Christian School. Our heartfelt desire is to prepare your teen spiritually and academically for whatever God has in store for the future.

Read Article Learn More about Evergreen Christian High School
